page.title: 09Domestic appliances
page.content:
The smooth running of Stevenage homes is very much dependant on labour saving machines. This is particularly true in our area where we have a high incidence of "working mums". All of the machines in our homes are dependant on a 240 volt electricity supply. In a survey of 100 homes the following incidence of domestic appliances was noted:-
Microcomputer 28% T.V. 100% Dish Washer 5% Telephone 82% Vacuum Cleaner 79% Food Processor/Mixer/Liquidizer 57% Radio/Cassette/Record Player 100% Video Cassette Recorder 48% Microwave Oven 25% Automatic Washing Machine 61% Tumble Drier 45%
